name: Tequila Sunrise Podstel
description:
WHY STAY AT TEQUILA SUNRISE PODSTEL?
Capsule Beds: Cozy, private beds with soft mattresses, personal lighting, and privacy curtains.
Optic Fiber WiFi: Lightning-fast internet throughout the hostel.
Laundry Service: Complimentary detergent provided.
Shampoo, body wash and conditioner: Available for free with hot showers.
Free Breakfast & Dinner: Enjoy pancakes, toast, cereals, and fresh coffee every morning, followed by a free dinner each evening.
Fully Equipped Kitchen: Prepare meals with modern appliances and utensils.
Workout Station: A small gym available for guests.
Relaxing Common Areas: Socialize on our terrace or in the lounge.
24/7 Security: Monitored access for your safety.

OPERATION HOURS
Reception: 9:00 AM – 9:00 PM
Check-in: From 2:00 PM
Check-out: Until 10:00 AM

SOCIAL ACTIVITIES
Join our free social dinners and weekly events, including karaoke, movie nights, and seasonal gatherings. These activities are perfect for meeting fellow travelers and creating lasting memories.


DISCOVER SURFERS PARADISE: A BACKPACKER’S DREAM
Surfers Paradise is known for its vibrant beach culture, lively nightlife, and thrilling outdoor adventures. The combination of world-class waves, golden sands, and an energetic atmosphere makes this the ultimate destination for backpackers.

Surfing and Beach Life: Whether you're an experienced surfer or a beginner, Surfers Paradise offers some of the best waves and the opportunity to enjoy a laid-back beach lifestyle.
Active Beach Vibe: Join beach volleyball, paddleboarding, or take a relaxing walk along the shore.
Nightlife: With bars, clubs, and beachfront venues just a block away, you’re never far from excitement.

EAST COAST BACKPACKING ADVENTURE: MUST-VISIT SPOTS

If you’re backpacking the East Coast of Australia, Surfers Paradise is a must-visit stop. Use our hostel as your base while exploring these iconic backpacker destinations:

Fraser Island: Explore the world’s largest sand island with its crystal-clear lakes and unique wildlife.
Whitsunday Islands: Experience paradise with pristine beaches and turquoise waters.
Cairns: Gateway to the Great Barrier Reef and its stunning marine life.
Magnetic Island: Secluded beaches and abundant wildlife await.
Byron Bay: Chill in Australia’s most laid-back surf town.
Noosa: Surf, hike national park trails, or relax in hidden coves.
Daintree Rainforest: The world’s oldest tropical rainforest.
Sydney: Visit the Blue Mountains or enjoy iconic views of the Opera House.
Brisbane: Explore the local art scene and vibrant city culture.
Gold Coast: Continue to enjoy the best beaches and surf right here!
TOP 10 BEACHES IN THE GOLD COAST
Surfers Paradise Beach: The iconic hotspot for surfers and sun-seekers alike.
Burleigh Heads Beach: Offers great waves and scenic nature walks.
Coolangatta Beach: Family-friendly beach with stunning views from Point Danger.
Main Beach: Perfect for swimming and stand-up paddleboarding in a quieter setting.
Broadbeach: Bustling with dining, shopping, and entertainment options.
Palm Beach: A picturesque spot for swimming and picnicking.
Currumbin Beach: Known for its excellent surf and nearby wildlife sanctuary.
Nobby Beach: Laid-back atmosphere with a range of great cafés.
Mermaid Beach: A peaceful retreat with soft sands and gentle waves.
Tallebudgera Creek: A calm oasis perfect for swimming and paddleboarding.

GOLD COAST MARKETS & SHOPPING
Surfers Paradise isn’t just about the beach—there are also plenty of markets and shopping spots to explore:

Burleigh Heads Markets: Held on the last Sunday of every month, this market offers fresh produce, local crafts, and live music.
Miami Marketta: Enjoy international street food, craft beer, and live music every Wednesday, Friday, and Saturday night.
Surfers Paradise Beachfront Markets: These markets are open on Wednesdays, Fridays, and Sundays, offering local art, fashion, and gourmet food with the ocean as your backdrop.
Broadbeach Art and Craft Markets: Family-friendly market featuring arts, crafts, and local produce.
Harbour Town: A must-visit for outlet shopping with discounts on top fashion brands.
Paca's Op Shop: For a unique shopping experience, visit Paca's Op Shop in Surfers Paradise. It’s perfect for affordable, quality second-hand finds, and by shopping here, you’re supporting sustainable and environmentally friendly fashion. Discover pre-loved items, from clothing to accessories, all carefully selected for quality and style.


ADDITIONAL SERVICES
Free Breakfast & Dinner
Linen and Towels Included
Luggage Storage
Express Check-In/Out
Hot Showers
Laundry Facilities (for a fee)
Secure Lockers
Free WiFi throughout the hoste

houseRules.notes:
Breakfast and Dinner included in rates
- Reception opens from  9:30 am to 9:00 pm.
- Breakfast from 8:00  to 9:00 am
- Check in from 2:00 pm to 10:00 pm. 
- Check out time is any time until 10:00 am.
**Cancellation policy: Cancel free of charge 3 days before arrival.
**Passport required for check in**

Things to note: Cancellation/ Prepayment
**For cancellations outside the no-fee cancellation window, a non-refundable policy will apply.
 Child policies:
Children are not allowed.
Cots and extra beds are not available at this property.
Age restriction: Minimum age for check-in is 18 years
PetsPets are not allowed.
Important information: Please note that there is a 2.6% charge when you pay with a credit card.
Guests must provide a credit card upon check in.
Guests are required to present a passport as a form of ID upon check-in.
Group bookings: For bookings of 6 or more people, a group booking policy applies.
 (Full upfront payment is needed, a damage deposit is required. Group reservations go through an approval process, so you can be contacted by the hostel to confirm that you agree with what is required.)  

Reception/front desk hours for your comfort and assistance from 9:30am to 9:00 pm.
**Please note that bed assignments are made according to bed and room type availability and therefore there is
no guarantee that the requested beds will be assigned together or in the same room. ***

**Charging e-bike battery is not allowed**
